page.title: 02HOUSING IN THE SEND AREA
page.content: More than 70% of all houses in Send and Sutton Green are detached and, of these, about 10% stand in plots of land greater than one quarter of a hectare. Of the rest, most are semi-detached with just a few pre- first world war cottages built in small terraces. There are a few notable old houses which range from a Medieval farmhouse to a handful of large Victorian dwellings. The majority of houses were built after the second world war, including a fairly substantial number of detached and semi-detached bungalows. Most properties in the area are privately owned but there are three medium-sized council estates in Send, one of which includes a small number of bungalows for the elderly.
